Azure 计划维护通知：1）虚拟机可用性集和云服务; 2）单实例虚拟机

亲爱的客户,

为改进虚拟机运行时所在的平台基础结构的总体可靠性、性能和安全性, 我们会在 Azure 数据中心进行定期更新。 我们想要通知您即将推出的维护将会影响以下两类服务： 1）虚拟机可用性集和云服务; 2）虚拟机单实例。如果您使用其中任何一类服务，请详阅下列维护时段信息：

Azure 虚拟机可用性集和云服务

在计划维护时段内，云服务的 Web role 和 Worker role 实例以及 IaaS 可用性集内的虚拟机可能会重新启动。重新启动的每个实例的总停机时间约为 15 分钟。对于可用性集里不同更新域的虚拟机，每台重启至少会出现 30 分钟的间隔。这样就可以在实例之间复制数据，从而实现高可用性。

以下是维护预计的开始时间，用北京时间表示。我们预计每个时段的维护将在开始时间后 48 小时内完成。

区域北京时间
中国北部（北京数据中心） 4月8日, 星期五, 23:00 PM (晚上 11 点)
中国东部 （上海数据中心） 4月15日, 星期五, 23:00 PM (晚上 11 点)

提示：

  • Azure 一次仅更新一个更新域。
  • Azure 虚拟机（ IaaS ）：此次维护操作只影响可用性集内的虚拟机，不影响可用性集外的虚拟机。可用性集内的单个虚拟机也将受此维护操作的影响。对于包含 5 个以上实例的可用性集，可用性集内同一更新域中的虚拟机可能会同时脱机。不在同一可用性集内的虚拟机也可能同时脱机。
  • Azure 云服务（ PaaS ）：同一角色且在同一更新域内的虚拟机可能会同时脱机。您可使用 reboot 和 start 等事件处理器代码( event handler )来处理重启过程中的一些业务应用逻辑，例如，业务安全停止/业务初始化。如果云服务的每个角色至少有两个或以上实例，且分布在不同的更新域中， 则此云服务在维护期间将保持 99.95% 以上的外部可连通性。

Azure 单实例虚拟机

在计划维护时段内，未在可用集内的单实例虚拟机可能会经历大约 15 分钟的关机和随后的重启。此次维护不影响可用性集内的虚拟机和云服务实例。我们鼓励您使用架构中的可用性集，以防止预先计划的维护引起停机。

以下是维护预计的开始时间，用北京时间表示。我们预计每个时段的维护将在开始时间后 12 小时内完成。

区域北京时间
中国东部 （上海数据中心） 4月23日, 星期六, 20:00 PM (晚上 8 点)
中国北部（北京数据中心） 4月24日, 星期日, 20:00 PM (晚上 8 点)

Azure Planned Maintenance Notice: 1) VMs in Availability Set and Cloud Service; 2) Single Instance VM

As part of our ongoing commitment to performance, reliability, and security, we sometimes perform maintenance operations in our Azure regions and datacenters. We want to notify you of upcoming maintenance operations that will impact 1) Virtual Machines in an availability set and Cloud Services; 2) Single Instance VM. If you utilize any of these services, please read the maintenance date/time details below:

VMs in Availability Set and Cloud Service

During the planned maintenance window, Web and Worker role instances and IaaS Virtual Machines (VMs) in an availability set may experience a reboot. Each instance that reboots will have approximately 15 minutes of total downtime. For Virtual Machine instances in an availability set, there will be at least a 30-minute interval between each VM in an availability set (if they are in different update domains). This enables data to be replicated between instances for high availability.

The planned maintenance start time is indicated below in UTC+8. For each section, we expect the update to finish within 48 hours of the start time.

RegionChina Time Zone (UTC+8)
China North（Beijing DC） Apr 8th , Friday, 23:00PM
China East （Shanghai DC） Apr 15th , Friday, 23:00PM

Notes:

  • Azure updates one upgrade domain at a time.
  • Azure Virtual Machines (IaaS):Only virtual machines inside availability sets are impacted in this upcoming operation; it does not affect virtual machines outside of availability sets. Single VMs in an availability set are also impacted in this maintenance operation. For availability sets that have more than 5 instances (by default), VMs in the same update domain of an availability set may be offline at the same time. VMs that are in different availability sets may be offline at the same time.
  • Azure Cloud Services (PaaS):VMs belonging to the same role and the same update domain may be offline at the same time. Cloud Services can use reboot and start event handlers for role instances. Cloud Services with two or more role instances in different upgrade domains will have external connectivity at least 99.95 percent of the time.

Single Instance VM

During the planned maintenance window, each virtual machine (VM) that is not in availability set may experience a shutdown, followed by approximately 15 minutes of downtime and a subsequent reboot. Please note, VMs that belong to an availability set and Cloud Services VM instances will not be impacted by this maintenance operation. We encourage you to consider using availability sets in your architecture to protect against downtime caused by planned maintenance.

The following are the planned start times in UTC+8. We expect the update to finish within 12 hours of the start time.

Region China Time Zone (UTC+8)
China East (Shanghai DC) Apr 23rd, Saturday, 20:00PM
China North (Beijing DC) Apr 24th, Sunday, 20:00PM
